name: io.github.pyroprompts/any-chat-completions-mcp
description: Integrate Claude with Any OpenAI SDK Compatible Chat Completion API - OpenAI, Perplexity, Groq, xAI, PyroPrompts and more. This implements the Model Context Protocol Server.

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for the AI chat provider

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_NAME
environment_variables.description: Name of the AI chat provider

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_MODEL
environment_variables.description: Model name to use for chat completions

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_BASE_URL
environment_variables.description: Base URL for the AI chat API

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_TIMEOUT
environment_variables.description: Timeout in milliseconds for chat requests

environment_variables.name: AI_CHAT_SYSTEM_PROMPT
environment_variables.description: Optional system prompt for chat completions

content.description: The content of the chat to send to OpenAI
